title: How was i insulting?
body:
Just going to leave this here
https://i.imgur.com/XA8vIGu.png[]

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion/EdEPmEmQ-mods-are-you-ok

> [{quoted}](name=EarthyMadness,realm=NA,application-id=yrc23zHg,discussion-id=nt9Ve02H,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-12-09T22:40:15.902+0000)
>
> You're calling them a troll by extension by saying that their champion summary is just as bad as the person they're complaining about. While it might not be your literal intent, it's still insulting to them and could be considered shaming

> [{quoted}](name=Cõmega,realm=NA,application-id=yrc23zHg,discussion-id=nt9Ve02H,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-12-09T23:43:24.223+0000)
>
> If that was the case why is this comment still up
> https://i.imgur.com/oYoo4P4.png[]
